text: Hop aboard a boozy cross - country trip as the riotous rising star first opens up about new projects ( a Judd Apatow film, her own TV show,'Girls Trip 2'), then the time she hit on Leonardo DiCaprio, got blown off by Roseanne Barr ( ` ` She been racist, why'd you all give her a TV show?'' ) and, yes, who really bit Beyonce. We've just reached cruising altitude when Tiffany Haddish orders her first drink. ` ` Vodka,'' she says, batting her long, thick lashes, ` ` on the rocks.''
